component.name: Package Updater
component.summary: Package update notifier applet for the COSMIC™ desktop

description.p: A modern package update manager applet for the COSMIC™ desktop, providing seamless package management directly from the panel across multiple Linux distributions.

Features include support for multiple package managers (Pacman, Paru, Yay, APT, DNF, Zypper, APK, Flatpak), visual status indicators, automatic update checking, and separate tracking of official repository and AUR packages on Arch-based systems.
Initial release of Package Updater Applet for the COSMIC™ desktop

ul.li: Support for pacman, paru, and yay package managers
Visual status indicators in COSMIC panel
Automatic update checking with configurable intervals
Separate tracking of official and AUR packages
